description:
Different exceptions define message as a parameterized string that cannot be used directly. The complete message with variables replaced with their real values are only available through the use of str() or unicode() on the exception class itself.

As such, NovaException's message variable should be renamed _message to indicate that it is private.

See bug 1154117 for an example of this.
title: NovaException's message variable should be private
